wf_workflow_version.name: Training - Request Training
wf_workflow_version.on_cancel: // This script executes if the workflow is cancelled.// The global variable context_sys_id contains the sys_id of the cancelled workflow context.

activity.display_value: Add Approvers to the watch list

sys_variable_value.value: any
approval
reject
approval_history
3bf802c20a0a0b52008e2859cd8abcf2
// Set 'answer' to the number of seconds this timer should wait answer = 0;
state=3^EQ

wf_activity.name: Load request data to Training Requests table

activity.display_value: Load request data to Training Requests table

sys_variable_value.value: SAIC Team Mgmt - Training Request for ${request.requested_for}
A training request was submitted by ${request.requested_for} for ${request.requested_for}.
// Set the variable 'answer' to a comma-separated list of user or group sys_ids that you want the email sent to. answer = workflow.scratchpad.reqLvl1Mgr
Request ${request.number} has been approved!

${request.requested_for}, Your request for training has been approved and you are now free to move forward with making arrangements for your request...
<fill in the details here>
// Set the variable 'answer' to a comma-separated list of user or group sys_ids that you want the email sent to. answer = workflow.scratchpad.reqRequestFor;
Request ${request.number} has been denied!

${request.requested_for}, Your request for training has been denied.
<fill in the details here>
// Set the variable 'answer' to a comma-separated list of user or group sys_ids that you want the email sent to. answer = workflow.scratchpad.reqRequestFor;
approved
rejected
